main.name: Yancheng (Ethan) Zhou
main.description: I am a first-year student majoring in Computer Science at the University of Virginia
main.bio: I'm an international student from China. I love solving problems and focusing on things with good applications. Also, I'm interested in advanced technology like artificial intelligence and machine learning. For my hobby, I dream to become a musician. I enjoy composing and playing the piano. Tennis is my favorite sport.
